content.query:
USE Sales;

CREATE SCHEMA [dwh];
GO

CREATE SCHEMA [ds];
GO

-- スキーマ一覧
SELECT * FROM sys.schemas ORDER BY name;
GO

-- 全ビュー取得
SELECT * FROM sys.sql_modules;

-- DSスキーマにビューを作成
CREATE VIEW [ds].[BlobParquetView_ds] AS
SELECT
  *,
  nyc.filepath(1) AS [year]
FROM
  OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://cs11003200266ef4121.blob.core.windows.net/test/sales/parquet/year=*/*.parquet',
    FORMAT='PARQUET'
  ) AS nyc

-- DWHスキーマにビューを作成
CREATE VIEW [dwh].[BlobParquetView_dwh] AS
SELECT
  *,
  nyc.filepath(1) AS [year]
FROM
  OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://cs11003200266ef4121.blob.core.windows.net/test/sales/parquet/year=*/*.parquet',
    FORMAT='PARQUET'
  ) AS nyc
